name: Ex machina
description: Ex Machina is a 2014 science fiction psychological thriller film.
largerDescription: Caleb Smith (Domhnall Gleeson) a programmer at a huge Internet company, wins a contest that enables him to spend a week at the private estate of Nathan Bateman (Oscar Isaac), his firm's brilliant CEO. When he arrives, Caleb learns that he has been chosen to be the human component in a Turing test to determine the capabilities and consciousness of Ava (Alicia Vikander), a beautiful robot. However, it soon becomes evident that Ava is far more self-aware and deceptive than either man imagined

name: WALL-E
description: WALL-E is the last robot left on Earth, programmed to clean up the planet
largerDescription: WALLâ€¢E (Waste Allocation Load Lifter Earth-Class) is the last robot left on Earth, programmed to clean up the planet, one trash cube at a time. However, after 700 years, he's developed one little glitchâ€”a personality. He's extremely curious, highly inquisitive, and a little lonely.

name: Tau
description: A woman is held captive by a scientist in a futuristic smart house
largerDescription: A woman is held captive by a scientist in a futuristic smart house, and hopes to escape by reasoning with the Artificial Intelligence that controls the house. Once a street-smart drifter, Julia (Maika Monroe) is the latest person held captive, a body and a mind to be exploited in a fatal experiment.

name: Her
description: Her is a 2013 American science-fiction romantic drama film
largerDescription: Her is a 2013 American science-fiction romantic drama film written, directed, and produced by Spike Jonze. The film follows Theodore Twombly (Joaquin Phoenix), a man who develops a relationship with Samantha (Scarlett Johansson), an artificially intelligent virtual assistant personified through a female voice.

name: Split
description: Split is a 2016 American psychological horror film
largerDescription: Split is a 2016 American psychological horror film written, directed and produced by M. Night Shyamalan, and starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy, and Betty Buckley. The film follows a man with 24 different personalities who kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls in an isolated underground facility.

name: I am Mother
description: The film had its world premiere on 25 January 2019.
largerDescription: Starring Clara Rugaard, Luke Hawker, Rose Byrne, and Hilary Swank, the film follows Daughter, a girl in a post-apocalyptic bunker, being raised by Mother, a robot aiding the repopulation of Earth. The film had its world premiere at the Sundance Film Festival on 25 January 2019.

name: What Happened to Monday
description: A set of identical septuplets must avoid being put to a long sleep
largerDescription: In a world where families are limited to one child due to overpopulation, a set of identical septuplets must avoid being put to a long sleep by the government and dangerous infighting while investigating the disappearance of one of their own.

name: The Woman in the Window
description: The film follows an agoraphobic woman who spy on her neighbors
largerDescription: The film follows an agoraphobic woman (Amy Adams) who begins to spy on her new neighbors (Gary Oldman, Fred Hechinger, and Julianne Moore) and is witness to a crime in their apartment. Anthony Mackie, Wyatt Russell, Brian Tyree Henry, and Jennifer Jason Leigh also star.
